title: Newton’s 3 Laws, with a bicycle - Joshua Manley

options.text: Objects tend to slow down when in motion.

options.text: Objects tend to keep doing what they are already doing.

options.label: D

title: How to think about gravity - Jon Bergmann

multiple-choice.question: What is the equation that describes the force of attraction between two objects?

options.label: D
options.text: F = G x M1 x M2 x R
